Intervention: · Improved contrast spectral mammography for the detection of breast cancer.
In-field digital mammography for breast cancer detection
Eligibility: - Heterogenic or extremely dense breasts (BI-RADS category c or d).
• History of allergy to iodized contrast
Pregnant or lactating according to standard practice
Previous history of breast excision biopsy (Patients with a history of needle heart biopsy will not be excluded)
• Previous breast reduction mastoplasty surgery history
• Previous history of breast augmentation surgery
A mental condition that renders the subject unable to understand the nature, scope and possible consequences of the study.
Results: The main evaluation criterion for this study is to determine the accuracy of EC mammography with respect to digital field mammography (FFDM) in patients with increased breast density (BCI-RADS) category c or d).
Title of the arm/group: Enhanced contrasting mammography
Description of the arm/group: Enhanced contrast spectral mammography for the detection of breast cancer.
Unit of measurement: precision percentage 100 (29 to 100)
Title of the arm/group: Standard digital mammography
Description of the arm/group: Digital mammography in the field for the detection of breast cancer
Unit of measurement: precision percentage 67 (9 to 99)
